document_data.name: Great Shadow's Mansion
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Shadow's Mansion''' was a temple dedicated to [[Eshowdow]], the Shadow Giant within the [[Chultan pantheon]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located within the [[Valley of Lost Honor]] on top of the crypt where Eshowdow was disinterred, but its precise location was known only to Eshowdow's most trusted servants.
document_data.Description: A massive step pyramid made completely of [[shadowstuff]] dominated the complex, but the pyramid and the entire temple were only visible to someone who underwent the ''[[summon shadow spirit]]'' incantation. The temple was also visible if viewed in the [[Shadowfell]], where it really existed, or via a ''[[true seeing]]'' [[spell]].
